translation.name: Hello, My name is Pedro
translation.about_me_1: I am a programmer passionate about Full-stack Development. I have developed strong skills in JavaScript, as well as a deep understanding of React.js, Node.js, and SQL databases.
translation.about_me_2: On the back-end, I had my first contact through personal experiences, initially with the Kotlin language, and currently working with Python.
translation.about_me_3: In addition to having an interest in Mobile Development, using the Flutter Framework coupled with the Dart language, I am constantly seeking to improve my skills in UI/UX design and mobile app development, always exploring new technologies and methodologies to enhance my abilities.
translation.call_sync: CallSync is a simple and efficient platform for managing service calls, developed using only HTML and CSS. This was proposed as an academic challenge and guided by our professor to test our design and organizational skills. Through this project, I ended up winning an award in the design category.
translation.milestone_motors: This project is a simple and elegant web page designed to showcase cars available for sale, built using React with Vite as the bundler. The user interface is enhanced with Tailwind CSS, providing a clean and responsive design.
translation.pokemon: This project is an implementation of the classic Pokémon game to be played in the Windows terminal. The game is written in TypeScript and provides a simple and fun console gaming experience for Pokémon fans.
